General.Name: ShanXi Coking Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanxi Coking Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of coke and related chemical products in China. It offers benzene, carbon black, solid asphalt, naphthalene, liquid asphalt, coked toluene, methyl naphthalene oil, ammonium sulfate, dephenolized phenolic oil, coking xylene, oil, neutral, phenate, light oil, sulfur, molten sulfur, anthracene oil, and gasoline. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Linfen, China. Shanxi Coking Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shanxi Coking Group Co., Ltd.
